entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
